sentences.sContent: ...the development of the fetus in the womb.

remMethod.val: wom(看作women) + b(看作box) → 女人的盒子 → 子宫

trans.tranCn: 子宫； 孕育处, the organ in which offspring is carried and nourished while it develops before birth)
trans.tranOther: the part of a woman’s or female animal’s body where her baby grows before it is born
